content: not my favorite. too slow
Great graphics and good storyline. Had to restart game at a couple of points but overall one of the more updated games I have played
Too dark. And im falling asleep playing it. 2 stars because of price... but even that was a waste of money.
Great game, but it keeps freezing every time I play it. If this can be remedied, I would recommend this game highly. Very annoying having to reload the game, when I really like the game.

I've always love Big Fish games. I have all the Phantasmat collection for PC. This is the first time I download one for my Android tablet and I'm loving it but is a bummer that I coudn't use the credits that I have in my Big Fish account to buy this game, when I've been a member of Big Fish long time ago.
Didn't even get to play, tried typing in my name and nothing would show. Tried closing the app still didn't work. Disappointed
4 stars because it froze up several times. Otherwise a great game with a spooky story. Nice range of puzzles.
LOVED this game! One of my favourites from this developer. I only wish it was longer, I finished it in one afternoon. Good graphics, creepy story and a variety of different and fun puzzles.

Was a little slow to get into but once I did I was hooked. Great length and had everything I would want in a game. I especially enjoyed the interactive HOGs. There are 2 versions in the app store. I recommend getting the $2.99 one. I wasn't going to play it because the version where you can play for free in the beginning costs more. But I found the $2.99 version and decided to go for it. I'm glad I did because I was not disappointed.
Great so far
Love it
Very good
This is more like the first phantasmst that I ever played. Spooky, mysterious, and great fun.
Fab game really enjoyed it üòÅ
Super!
It stopped and never would come on again!!
Beautiful

Unique variety. Story for mature audience (enjoyed), good graphics, lengthy game time - but the outstanding call-out here is the unique types of games and interactions. HOGS are not just look at a bunch of words and find the corresponding image, real thought has gone into giving the player variety. Would have liked more than just a couple of vague phrases when tapping on new items, and felt like I was carrying TOO much before I vaguely knew what it was for, but do recommend this game highly.
Really enjoyed it, lots to do!

This game is great. After couple of average and some quite bad games this is why I still try your games. Storyline is good and there is really idea behind it. Graphics are beautiful and sounds are excellent. There's different kinds of minigames, not just hops. There's also bonus chapter what that is nicely done and sits on the main story. And there's little bonus game. So there's enough doing and playing and everything works just smoothly. Worth of that money for my opinion. Enjoyed playing!
This is the best game ever! It has good puzzles and a great story. The bonus game is great too! It reveals a secret and the graphics are great. I would request people to get the game.
I just purchased this game and I'm unable to load it. I would like a full refund please
Love ittt.

Loved this game. Really engaging storyline & gameplay. Really liked all the 
morphing objects & mini games. Definitely worth the money & will probably 
play through game again. Great bonus chapter & extras that I actually 
played. One of the better Big Fish games.

Really great game! Love the mix of HOP and mini-games. Some genuinely scary 
moments with the headphones on!
Have been enjoying this series. Keep up the good work :-)

Phenomenal. Best Phantasmat in the series. Reminds me a bit of the great Ravenhurst series. It has everything this type of game needs in addition to a very creepy storyline. Amazing job and would highly recommend the game.

Weird, nonsensical storyline but still entertaining.  This game had one of the most difficult puzzles I have ever tried to solve. I eventually gave up...I never do that! But the game was long and worth the $$$.

This game was great. First one I've really enjoyed in a while. The story was good and interesting, the mini games were varied and enjoyable, they weren't hard but some took time and patience. The only thing was it kept sticking, it lagged and froze 4 times and I had to reboot. It stuck on a few of the videos so the story got confusing but I was able to watch them in bonus content. I got this at a great price but I would've paid full price. Great job.

Very well done,I absolutely loved the map made the game much more enjoyable instead of some other games where you have to press back multiple times and then you get lost.The story is a mixture of sadness and macabre showing the worst in humans and should be an eye opener,overall quite a long game with great HOP play well done team keep up with the great work and plz use this hint and map system for your next games it's great.
Poor Thomas, he needs a hug
Dope game! Sequel
Love it
They have in-game adds. That's an absolute no-no for paid apps!
Great graphics, good story... can't wait for sequel !
Have not stopped playing yet, I have to sleep sometime!
This is so much easier than my favorite series, Ravenhurst! Very impressive!
